edu.ucdavis.cstars.client.symbol

Class TextSymbol

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.gwt.core.client.JavaScriptObject
      • edu.ucdavis.cstars.client.symbol.Symbol
        • edu.ucdavis.cstars.client.symbol.TextSymbol

  • public class TextSymbol
extends Symbol
    Text symbols are used to add text on the graphics layer.
    Author:
    Justin Merz

        public final TextSymbol.AlignType getAlign()
        The text alignment in relation to the point. Default value: ALIGN_MIDDLE
        Returns:
        AlignType

      • getAngle

        public final int getAngle()
        Text angle. 0 is horizontal and the angle moves clockwise.
        Returns:
        int

        Returns:
        boolean

      • isRotated

      • setDecoration

        public final TextSymbol setDecoration(TextSymbol.DecorationType decoration)
        Sets the decoration for the text.Many browsers including Internet Explorer 7, Firefox and Opera 9 do not support the decoration properties for text symbols.
        Parameters:
        decoration - - The decoration on the text.
        Returns:
        TextSymbol

        public final TextSymbol setKerning(boolean kerning)
        Sets whether to adjust the spacing between characters in the text string.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        TextSymbol

      • setOffset

        public final TextSymbol setOffset(int x,
                   int y)
        Sets the x and y offset of the text.
        Parameters:
        x - - X offset value in pixels.
        y - - Y offset value in pixels.
        Returns:
        TextSymbol

      • setRotated

        public final TextSymbol setRotated(boolean rotated)
        Sets whether every character in the text string is rotated. Many browsers including Internet Explorer 7, Firefox and Opera 9 do not support rotated for text symbols.
        Parameters:
        rotated - - Set to true to rotate all characters in the string.
        Returns:
        TextSymbol
